transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Yes.

Executive: Good morning sir, main Kusum baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART headquarter se bataye. Aapne call kiya sir IndiaMART headquarter se 96 pe bataye.

Customer: Ji mera ek ye profile hai IndiaMART mein.

Executive: Haan ji Balaji Tools and Hardware bataye.

Customer: Yes. Hello.

Customer: Ji maine matlab isme koi kaam nahi ho pa raha hai mera.

Customer: Matlab subscription liya hua hai to jaise as a seller main isme matlab sale aur buy nahi kar pa raha hu, sale nahi kar pa raha hu product.

Executive: Kya issue aa raha hai sir aapko ye bataye matlab clients nahi mil rahe hain, relevant customer nahi mil rahe hain, kya issue aa raha hai wo bataye ek baar aap.

Customer: Ji sir baat ye hai ki mera ho gaya shop wholesale ka, theek hai to main supply karta hu.

Customer: To isme jaise mujhe jo buyleads milta hai ye sab matlab ek retailer milta hai jaise kisi ko ek piece ka matlab ek piece requirement hai kisi ko do piece to ye matlab aap jaise kahin ek piece requirement ho gaya to koi ye Rajasthan ka hai koi ek koi

Customer: To ye sab cheez main ek ek piece kahin bhijwa nahi paunga na, mere ko to matlab aisa chahiye jo matlab jaise mera Balaji Tools and Farm hai to mujhe koi

Customer: Farm wala chahiye jaise koi wholesaler jo ho mujhe bulk mein mujhse product le.

Executive: Main samajh gayi sir aapka point. Dealing location hamara local ka hi rahega ya hum all over Uttar Pradesh ya aapne Assam location cover kar sakte hain sir?

Customer: Nahi dekhiye all over ki all over matlab all over India ka hi chahiye par isme matlab Assam mainly hai, Guwahati jaise mainly hai. To mujhe jaise buyer is type ka chahiye jaise jiska shop ho, jiska power uska shop ho, to uska shop ho.

Customer: Waisa mujhe chahiye nahi to mera to ye koi fayda hi nahi hai isme.

Executive: Sir actually na sir IndiaMART B2B platform hi hai. To yahan pe jo clients milta hai aapko trader mil sakta hai, bade bulk clients wale bulk orders milne wale bhi client milenge aapko to isse aap befikar rahiye. But point is na mujhe aisa lagta hai ki kuch na kuch aapke catalog mein correction ki zarurat hai aur aapke service use karna jo jo tarika hai usko shayad thoda change karwaye. Aapko jaise main service bataungi jo correction main aapko bata rahi hu I request you ki aap waise ek hafta work kare. Uske baad mujhe us pe feedback dijiye ki kya wo improvement mein hai ya nahi. Theek hai? To mujhe pehle ye bataye electric panel planner mein hum log deal kar rahe hain. Aapke paas time hai sir hum log video call pe baat kar sakte hain? Is this possible right now sir? Next 5-10 minute baat kar sakte hain. Theek hai thank you so much aap line pe rukiye main aapke paas link share kar rahi hu hum log iske upar discuss kar lete hain taki issue dobara na ho. Jaise main aapko service bataungi please ek hafta same analytics use kariye aur ek hafte baad bhi agar same issue rehta hai, nahi bhi rehta hai phir bhi main aapko call karungi jisme aap feedback se improvement hai ya nahi hai wo mujhe zarur batayega. Theek hai? Ji. Baki jo aapki need hai wo mere ko samajh aati hai uske upar hum discuss karte hain. Aapka planning ye hai ki hum local mein zyada se zyada deal karu aur bulk mein mere ko chahiye clients bhi to main hai na? Theek hai samajh.

Executive: Fine.

Executive: Aapke paas desktop or laptop hai sir aap kaise join karoge video call phone se ya laptop desktop or what?

Customer: Nahi nahi phone pe hi karunga.

Executive: Phone ke through hi join kar lenge. Theek hai pehle aapke paas aap apna IndiaMART ka mail open kijiye matlab apna mail open kijiye.

Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Wahan pe join with Google Meet yes join with join with Google Meet ka option aa raha hoga ask to join pe click kijiye ga.

Customer: Share screen karna hai kya?

Executive: Nahi abhi join kijiye pehle aap.

(silence)

Executive: Apuni kotha pati thoka byakti jane apunar call holdot rakhise anugrah kori lineote thako. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Apuni kotha pati thoka byakti jane apunar call holdot rakhise anugrah kori lineote thako. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are

Executive: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting relevant customers. 

- Wants bulk buyers, not retailers.

- Wants buyers from Assam, Guwahati mainly.



Resolution:

- Executive explained IndiaMART is a B2B platform.

- Executive suggested catalog correction and service usage changes.

- Executive offered to discuss over a video call.

- Executive shared a Google Meet link.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will use suggested analytics for a week.

- Executive will call after a week for feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, video call
